      • Button

        public Button(int x,
      int y,
      java.lang.String path)
        Instantiates a new button.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate for the button's location on the screen
        y - the y coordinate for the button's location on the screen
        path - the file path of the Image

        public boolean isMouseOver(int mx,
                  int my)
        Checks if the Mouse cursor is over this button.
        Parameters:
        mx - the Mouse's x coordinate
        my - the Mouse's y coordinate
        Returns:
        true, if is mouse over this button

      • update

        public abstract void update()
        Performs the button's function. Usually this method is used in combination with isMouseOver().
